channel.title: MW2 trouble
channel.description:
this issue started after i installed the game onto windows 7, i never had this issue on windows Vista. I've installed the latest drivers for my GTX 285 2GB, getting an answer from IW next to impossible. hope you guys can help.
[img]https://img14.imageshack.us/img14/9416/61121891.png[/img]

item.title: MW2 trouble
item.dc:creator: Deutscher_Scharfschu
item.description:
weird, i wonder how why the drivers have that automatically set on. i usually do a sweep before i play a game. when it was on Vista it was automatically set tot off.

thanks anyways man.

Read full topic

item.title: MW2 trouble
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
It’s the AO effect.
Fix: right click desktop->NVIDIA Control Panel->Manage 3D Settings->Program Settings (Tab)->Look for “Call of Duty 6: Modern Warfare 2 (iw4sp.exe)” set feature “Ambient Occlusion” to “Off”. Do the same for “Call of Duty 6: Modern Warfare 2 (iw4mp.exe)”. That will fix it.

Read full topic
